candidates.reason: The comment directly discusses the portability and size-related features of the Darwin FPV quad, which is described in the topic as 'very small' and fitting in a pocket.
candidates.comment: This video discusses the portability of the Darwin FPV drone. This drone is very small and can fit in your pocket. The drone is made using injection molding, so it is very tough and lightweight. The only downside of this drone is the decreased battery life since there is not a lot of space for a larger-sized battery. This is a very interesting concept of decreasing the size of the drone for easy portability and can have many implications. Such as military use civilian use such as weddings or wanting an overhead view of a city. The possibilities are endless and can potentially. Be redesigned in phase 2 of our project.
candidates.url: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9fYzb1g8tzw: DarwinFPV CineAPE 25: A tough little pocket rocket
